@asa138 radiation passes through walls ....!!! Please DO NOT sleep With it under your pillow !!!!
Health is wealth .. Look after yourself !!
Keep calls SHORT .... SMS instead ... dO NOT give phones to little children ... Use LANDLINE instead !!
DO NOT sleep with the phone beside your head ... AVOiD using the phone when hair is wet !!
Affect adjoining organs !! ... AVOID cordless phones the radiation is even stronger than cell phones !!
Turn the phone OFF when not in use .... Keep it away from head and body ... Do NOT keep in your pockets ... The heat from the device will
Since I'm on a roll on the issue .. Let me give you a list ... AVOID using phone in cars lifts trains ... Any metallic enclosure !!
Even on a prescription drug there will be a word of caution !! A cell phone can create serious health problems if used indiscriminately !
The govt MUST make it mandatory . A list of dos and don't s with every mobile phone sold !!People must be informed cell phones are not toys.
